name: Red And Black Slider:Now whith Incremental difficulty
name_original: Red And Black Slider:Now whith Incremental difficulty
description:
Controls:

Left and Right arrow keys.

A and D keys.

Your aim is to get as high score as possible, challenge your friends and see who comes out on top.

Can you beat my terrible high score of 68 from only playing the game for a short while outside of the unity environment?

NOTE:Sorry for the need to reinstall had some issues pushing apatch so i just uploaded the game again.
